sent.orig: Commute to the so-called Volcano Island Island of island flight.
sent.trans: 早上飞往火山大岛，游览火山口下的黑沙滩，那是长年火山熔岩流下所形成的奇观。

sent.orig: Jurong Island is a S$7 million reclamation project. A causeway links this island to the mainland.
sent.trans: 裕廊岛是一个投资七百万新元的填海项目，一条高架高速公路将岛屿与主岛相连接。

sent.orig: Maldives' Vabbinfaru Island, the island is known for its tranquility and romance.
sent.trans: 马尔代夫瓦宾法鲁岛----瓦宾法鲁岛以宁静和浪漫著称。

sent.orig: Emerald Island is an island, is the jewel in the Gold Coast.
sent.trans: 翡翠岛是一个宝岛，是黄金海岸的一颗明珠。

sent.orig: The only outstanding issue is Senkaku Shoto [Diaoyu Island], a small and uninhabited island.
sent.trans: 悬案是一个钓鱼岛，那是一个很小的地方，上面没有人烟。
